title: Hi-tech control room allowing live monitoring of PRSU exams - Hindustan Times
content: Hi-tech control room allowing live monitoring of PRSU exams  Hindustan Times
description: Prayagraj-based Prof Rajendra Singh (Rajju Bhaiya) State University (PRSU) has set up hi-tech control room that is enabling the varsity to live monitor all 392 exam centres located across four districts under Prayagraj division.
